name: outsideofcol
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, cbtwn, cop(c1, c2))))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 >, c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 >, ¬ c0[Btwn]< c1, c2 >)

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, cbtwn, cop(c1, c2)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 > → c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 >)
⊣ (c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 > ↔(c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 > ∧ ¬ c0[Btwn]< c1, c2 >))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, cbtwn, cop(c1, c2)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 > → c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 >)
⊣ (c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 > ↔(c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 > ∧ ¬ c0[Btwn]< c1, c2 >))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)), wn(wbr(c0, cbtwn, cop(c1, c2)))))
body.pretty: ⊢ (c0[OutsideOf]< c1, c2 > ↔(c0[Colinear]< c1, c2 > ∧ ¬ c0[Btwn]< c1, c2 >))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wbr(c0, coutsideof, cop(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, ccolin, cop(c1, c2)))

comment: Outside of implies colinearity. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 26-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
